titleInfo.title: Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity, Inc., MLK Silent March

mods.abstract: Photograph of members of Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity, Inc., leading a march in honor of Reverend Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., on Tennessee Tech University's campus on a rainy day. Three fraternity brothers are holding a black and gold banner with the fraternity's letters and Omicron Phi chapter name. Tennessee Tech University President Robert Bell is walking beside the students carrying the banner. The fraternity brothers are dressed in formal black suits and holding up umbrellas.

name.namePart: Tennessee Technological University. Office of Communications and Marketing

subject.topic: Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity. Omicron Phi Chapter (Tennessee Technological University)
